title: Crocus Technology Acquired by Allegro MicroSystems to Accelerate Innovation in TMR Sensing Technology - PR Newswire
summary: Crocus Technology, a leader in Tunnel Magnetoresistance sensor technology, is being acquired by Allegro MicroSystems for $420 million cash. This acquisition aims to enhance Allegro's offerings in e-mobility, clean energy, and automation markets fueled by the growth of TMR technology.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334413, 334419, 334519, 335999 - Magnetic Sensor Manufacturing, Other Semiconductor and Electronic Component Manufacturing, Other Measuring and Controlling Device Manufacturing, All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing
